Collection.LongName: Landsat 8 Operational Land Imager (OLI)_Thermal Infared Sensor (TIRS) Pre-WRS-2
Collection.DataSetId: Landsat 8 Operational Land Imager (OLI)_Thermal Infared Sensor (TIRS) Pre-WRS-2 V1
Collection.Description: Abstract:The Landsat 8 OLI/TIRS Pre-WRS-2 data set contains nearly 10,000 scenes acquired by the Operational Land Imager (OLI) and/or Thermal Infrared Sensor (TIRS) sensors after launch (February 11, 2013) through April 10, 2013, when the satellite achieved operational orbit (WRS-2). The earliest images are TIRS data only. While these data meet the quality standards and have the same geometric precision as data acquired on April 11, 2013 and beyond, the geographic extents of each scene will differ. Most data will be processed to an L1T (as other standard products), and the pixel size will be 30 meters. There may be some differences in the early TIRS images due to telescope temperature changes, although they should be within +/- 1 percent. The data acquired during the Landsat 7/Landsat 8 underfly on March 29 - 30, 2013 are also available.

Contact.OrganizationName: USGS Earth Resources Observation and Science Center (EROS)

Address.StreetAddress: USGS Earth Resources Observation and Science Center (EROS), 47914 252nd St

Characteristic.Name: EquatorCrossingTime
Characteristic.Description: Local time of the equator crossing and direction (ascending or descending)

AdditionalAttribute.Name: AcquisitionDate
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Year, month and day that this scene was imaged.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: AquisitionQuality
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Acquisition Quality is a value, expressed as a single digit number, based on: (1) errors encountered during archive processing; and/or (2) visible artifacts in the data when manually inspected.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: DataTypeL0rp
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Data type identifier string used to create the L0Rp product.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: GeometricRmseModelX
AdditionalAttribute.Description: RMSE of the geometric residuals (meters) measured on the GCPs used in geometric precision correction.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: GeometricRmseModelY
AdditionalAttribute.Description: RMSE of the geometric residuals (meters) measured on the GCPs used in geometric precision correction.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: StationId
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Original ground receiving station to which this data was downlinked.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: SunAzimuth
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Sun azimuth angle (degrees) at the WRS scene center. A positive value (+) indicates angles to the East or clockwise from North. Zero indicates North. A negative value (-) indicates angles to the West or counterclockwise from North.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: SunElevation
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Sun elevation angle (degrees) at the WRS scene center. A positive value (+) indicates a daytime scene. Zero indicates a nighttime scene. A negative value (-) indicates a nighttime scene.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: WRSRow
AdditionalAttribute.Description: WRS latitudinal center line of a Landsat image.

OnlineResource.Description: Landsat 8 Operational Land Imager (OLI) and Thermal Infrared Sensor (TIRS)
